Notes: Single-seat variant with RBE2-AA AESA radar (200+ km detection), 4-6 Meteor/MICA-NG internal/external loads, and SPECTRA EW for fire-and-forget BVR; F4 upgrades (2025 IOC) add AI targeting and drone integration; backbone of 5 squadrons (e.g., EC 1/4 Gascogne), enabling 150 km networked envelopes via E-3F cueing.

Two-seat variant with same RBE2-AA AESA and 6 Meteor missiles for advanced tactics/cooperative ops; replaces Mirage 2000N in nuclear role; 13 delivered in 2025 toward 42 total Air Force B's, supporting hybrid manned-unmanned BVR with nEUROn UCAVs.

Upgraded interceptor with RDY-2 radar (150 km), 4-6 MICA missiles, and mid-life updates for datalink fusion; one lost in 2022, 6 donated to Ukraine (as 5FU); EC 1/2 Cigognes squadron at Saint-Dizier for QRA/BVR patrols, integrated with Ground Master 400 radars.

Modernized tactical bomber with RDY radar (120 km) and 4 MICA/EXOCET loads for SEAD/BVR support; 36 upgraded by 2023 (SCALP cruise missiles); sustains volume in mixed Rafale ops, with 2025 focus on EW enhancements for contested airspace.

AWACS with AN/APY-2 radar (400 km horizon) for off-board targeting and mid-course Meteor updates; Block 40/45 upgrades complete (CFM56 engines); CEAM at Avord AB, to be replaced by AFSC in 2030s but critical for 150 km BVR kill chains.

MRTT with boom/probe refueling for 3+ hour BVR extensions on Rafale/Mirage; 3 more conversions from civilian A330s in 2025; FR at Istres, enabling power projection (e.g., Pégase 2025 exercise with NATO allies).

Strategic/tactical transport with refueling pods for surge deployments of fighters/EW assets; 8 delivered in 2025 toward 50 total; ET 1/61 at Orleans, supports forward basing for sustained BVR in Indo-Pacific.

Upgraded Hercules with modern avionics for rapid radar/fighter deployment and ISR cueing; 2 operational post-2024 deliveries (2 more on order); ET 2/61 at Orleans, enhances ground-radar gap-filling for BVR networks.
